akas: Nigel Marven's Cruise Ship Adventures (original title)
Κρουαζιέρα με τον Νάιτζελ Μάρβεν Greece
akas from release info: Nigel Marven's Cruise Ship Adventures (original title)
Κρουαζιέρα με τον Νάιτζελ Μάρβεν Greece

1.title: A Caribbean Voyage

episode of.title: Nigel Marven's Cruise Ship Adventures (TV Mini-Series 2015–2016)

1.plot: Miami, Florida. The intrepid explorer and wildlife aficionado, Nigel Marven, embarks on a wonderful adventure to introduce astonishing and peculiar animals to audacious passengers and crew in the sun-kissed Caribbean islands.

2.title: A Scandinavian Voyage

episode of.title: Nigel Marven's Cruise Ship Adventures (TV Mini-Series 2015–2016)

2.plot: Each year, more than 200 liners visit the turquoise fjords, and Nigel gets his snake hook looking for the adder, Arctic Circle's only venomous snake; however, in the Shetland Islands, he's in for the ultimate otter-watching experience.

3.title: A Mediterranean Voyage

episode of.title: Nigel Marven's Cruise Ship Adventures (TV Mini-Series 2015–2016)

3.plot: Nigel Marven tours the azure Aegean Sea, the picturesque Greek Islands, and the magnificent Venice to discover swift Eleonora's Falcons, a spur-thighed tortoise, a non-venomous leopard snake, and a Venetian pipefish.

4.title: A Central American Voyage

episode of.title: Nigel Marven's Cruise Ship Adventures (TV Mini-Series 2015–2016)

4.plot: Heading full speed ahead to Central America, Nigel visits Corcovado National Park for the endangered jaguar, while in the Audubon Park, he finds the Three-toed Amphiuma and the heavy alligator snapping turtle.

5.title: An Indian Ocean Odyssey

episode of.title: Nigel Marven's Cruise Ship Adventures (TV Mini-Series 2015–2016)

5.plot: Nigel's voyage to the exotic Indian Ocean begins from Mumbai where massive Indian Flying Foxes and extraordinary leopards coexist with man; however, nothing can prepare the bold passengers for an electrifying encounter with a real cobra.

6.title: An Antarctic Voyage

episode of.title: Nigel Marven's Cruise Ship Adventures (TV Mini-Series 2015–2016)

6.plot: From the capital of tango in Buenos Aires, Nigel prepares himself for an eighteen-day Antarctic cruise, in search of wide-winged albatrosses, gigantic Humpback whales, Leopard seals, and black-and-white Gentoo penguins.

imdb.plot outline: In this exciting six-part travelling series of cosmopolitan allure, the indefatigable adventurer, explorer, and wildlife aficionado, Nigel Marven, ventures out on the open seas, around the four corners of the earth. Aboard a luxurious cruise liner, Marven reveals another aspect of a laid-back ship voyage, as he meets with audacious passengers eager to discover the amazing nature that awaits only a hair's breadth away from the port of each stunning destination. From the sunny Caribbean to the rough cliffs of Scandinavia and the deep-blue Mediterranean Sea, Nigel then heads to Panama, India, and the Antarctic, in search of astonishing and peculiar creatures, including giant whales, adorable sloths, fearful crocodiles, and even a tiny lawn-green praying mantis. Are you ready for a wonderful cruise ship adventure?
imdb.title: Nigel Marven's Cruise Ship Adventures
plot: Aboard a luxurious cruise liner, wildlife aficionado, Nigel Marven, ventures out on the open seas, to discover along with audacious passengers the amazing nature that awaits outside the port of six stunning destinations.::Nick Riganas

In this exciting six-part travelling series of cosmopolitan allure, the indefatigable adventurer, explorer, and wildlife aficionado, Nigel Marven, ventures out on the open seas, around the four corners of the earth. Aboard a luxurious cruise liner, Marven reveals another aspect of a laid-back ship voyage, as he meets with audacious passengers eager to discover the amazing nature that awaits only a hair's breadth away from the port of each stunning destination. From the sunny Caribbean to the rough cliffs of Scandinavia and the deep-blue Mediterranean Sea, Nigel then heads to Panama, India, and the Antarctic, in search of astonishing and peculiar creatures, including giant whales, adorable sloths, fearful crocodiles, and even a tiny lawn-green praying mantis. Are you ready for a wonderful cruise ship adventure?::Nick Riganas
